shoppingCart

Interface ShoppingCartService


  • public interface ShoppingCartService
    This interface represents the basic service a shopping cart should provide to the clients
    Author:
    Matías

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addArticle(shoppingCart.Article article)
      Adds a new article to the shopping cart
      int getAmountOfArticles()
      Returns the size of the ArrayList that stores all the articles selected so far.
      shoppingCart.Article getArticle(int index)
      Looks for an article inside the ArrayList that stores all the articles selected and pick the one located at the specified index
      java.util.ArrayList<shoppingCart.Article> getArticles()
      It should return an ArrayList containing all the articles that have been added to the shopping cart so far
      double getTotal()
      Calculates the amount of money a client should pay for all the articles of the shopping cart
      void removeArticle(shoppingCart.Article article)
      Removes an article from the shopping cart

    • Method Detail

      • addArticle

        void addArticle(shoppingCart.Article article)
        Adds a new article to the shopping cart
        Parameters:
        article - The article that will be added to the shopping chart

      • removeArticle

        void removeArticle(shoppingCart.Article article)
        Removes an article from the shopping cart
        Parameters:
        article - The article to be removed

      • getArticles

        java.util.ArrayList<shoppingCart.Article> getArticles()
        It should return an ArrayList containing all the articles that have been added to the shopping cart so far
        Returns:
        An ArrayList
        that stores all the articles added to the shopping cart

      • getArticle

        shoppingCart.Article getArticle(int index)
        Looks for an article inside the ArrayList that stores all the articles selected and pick the one located at the specified index
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the article we want to retrieve
        Returns:
        The article located at the specified index

      • getTotal

        double getTotal()
        Calculates the amount of money a client should pay for all the articles of the shopping cart
        Returns:
        A double value that represents an amount of money

      • getAmountOfArticles

        int getAmountOfArticles()
        Returns the size of the ArrayList that stores all the articles selected so far. In other words it returns the amount of articles that have been selected
        Returns:
        A number that informs the amount of articles selected
